title: THE WITCHER Trailer Breakdown, Easter Eggs & Details You Missed!
author: Think Story
comment: is there any analist who read the books? everyone i've watched absolutely have no idea what they're talking about.

The "Amazonian looking tribe" is the dryads of Brokilon. Their leader is Ethińe. Ciri is taken by them when she runs away into their forest. This is also where Geralt and Ciri meet for the first time. 
  
And im assuming that the monster we see is the Striga that Geralt is nearly killed by.
This breakdown shows painfully that the author has not read the books. Considering he thought the dryads were Amazonian warriors or elves
What's the point of a trailer breakdown when you know nothing about the source material?
In that shot with "Ciri blasting everyone away"..it's not Ciri but her mother "Pavetta" ..in that shot ciri isn't even born yet..it's straight from the books.
description:
A full on breakdown of the latest teaser trailer for Netflix's "The Witcher" starring Henry Cavill. In it I take a deep dive, analyze, and review every shot to find out just what we're in store for this season.

The Witcher Trailer:
